H0.text: what kind of government does japan have now. Federal Republic

H1.text: what kind of government does japan have now. Constitutional Monarchy

H2.text: what kind of government does japan have now. Parliamentary Democracy

H3.text: what kind of government does japan have now. Unitary state

A4.text: Japan is a constitutional monarchy with a bicameral legislature known as the National Diet.

A5.text: Japan is a unitary state and constitutional monarchy in which the power of the emperor (Tenn≈ç) is limited to a ceremonial role.

A6.text: Japan is a unitary state, containing forty-seven administrative divisions, with the emperor as its head of state.

A7.text: The executive branch of Japan is headed by the prime minister.
